activities: Uber Technologies, Inc. collects, stores and processes personal information regarding data subjects located in the EEA and/or Switzerland on behalf of Uber B.V., a private limited liability company established in the Netherlands that acts as a data controller with respect to this information.  Uber B.V. collects information in connection with providing its websites, mobile applications and online services to data subjects in the EEA and Switzerland.  The information processed by Uber Technologies Inc. on behalf of Uber B.V. includes user contact and payment method information, mobile device information (e.g., geolocation), information received from drivers (e.g., when applying to become a driver or when using the mobile application) and other data provided by data subjects located in the EEA and/or Switzerland or otherwise collected automatically via Uber B.V.’s websites, mobile applications and online services.  Uber B.V. uses this information to operate and improve its services in the EEA and Switzerland, monitor and analyze trends, communicate with data subjects located in the EEA and/or Switzerland about offers, promotions, and news it thinks will be of interest to them and for the other purposes described in its privacy policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data about users and drivers, collected both online and offline, including manually processed data.
recoursemech: JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
